rules_text:
Flying
Whenever this Vehicle attacks, you may sacrifice another nontoken creature or artifact. If you do, create a tapped 3/3 green Telethia creature token with “As long as this creature is untapped, it has hexproof.”
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
notes: 2.2.0: Changed to a vehicle that makes a telethia by saccing something. Fits the flavor more directly and provides the vehicle deck a way to generate creatures from their vehicles.
